0.text: Q: From who are the normals map textures ?

1.text:
A: Most of the normal maps textures are 
from a Java Edition pack called 
'Vanilla-Normals-Renewed-master' 
by Poudingue. Poudingue's GitHub
 https://github.com/Poudingue/Vanilla-Norma
ls-Renewed-1.12

2.text:
Q: Will the texture pack be updated to newer 
version ?

3.text:
A: Of course i will, by the way, if you want to 
support me. Donate on Paypal 
https://paypal.me/mazewave.
